name: Green House
description:
This prototype was completed for a Game-A-Week class where we have to complete a game on a specific topic/ theme within the week! 

This week's theme was: Physics (Week 4)

How to:

WASD - move

Mouse - look around

LMB - pull up/down to interact with the fruits

ALT F4 to exit game.

Enjoy the environment! Not so much a game but rather more with playing around with post processing effects and the physics component in Unity! Fruits are the only interactable objects in the game!! I may consider adding more in the future :) (VERY SHORT GAME)

Source:

[ALL SOUNDS USED ARE ROYALTY FREE]
